General.Name: Ispire Technology Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: Ispire Technology Inc. researches, develops, designs, commercializes, sales, markets, and distributes e-cigarettes and cannabis vaping products worldwide. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Los Angeles, California. Ispire Technology Inc. is a subsidiary of Pride Worldwide Investment Limited.
General.Address: 19700 Magellan Drive, Los Angeles, CA, United States, 90502
